description:
A mysterious, unnamed bus driver who seems to know more than he reveals and constantly shows up to offer advice to Tsukune, he is usually portrayed smoking a cigar. He is the one who requests the board chairman help keep Tsukune`s ghoulish nature at bay. It is unknown if the bus driver is human or a youkai, but he does have an extensive knowledge in the supernatural, having identified Ishigami`s Lilith Mirror as the cause of the uproar during the school festival.
He is also one of the three Dark Lords.
name: Untenshu
